annotations.description: There was no time for the supporters to get bored during the game as it was full of action and thrilling moments. A very even game was seen on the pitch today. Both teams attempted to play possession football.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: Nothing more will happen in this game as the referee blows for full time.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Pedro (Chelsea) has tested the patience of referee Martin Atkinson and goes into the book for a previous late challenge.
Siem De Jong (Newcastle Utd) seems to be alright and is okay to carry on.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Newcastle Utd take a short corner instead of sending the ball into the penalty area.

Gabriel Obertan (Newcastle Utd) fails to find any of his teammates inside the box as his pass is blocked. Newcastle Utd have been awarded a corner kick. The referee and one of his assistants both point at the corner flag.

annotations.label: injury
annotations.description: Siem De Jong (Newcastle Utd) is having a really tough time right now. We are about to find out how serious his injury is.

annotations.label: time
annotations.description: 4 min. of stoppage time to be played.
The Chelsea players keep the ball and are exchanging a combination of passes. They are waiting for gaps in the defence to open up.

Ramires (Chelsea) creates himself some space inside the goalmouth and connects with the resulting free kick. His header would have probably ended up in the middle of the goal, but Tim Krul pulls off a superb reflex save to thwart him.
Moussa Sissoko (Newcastle Utd) trips an opposition player and Martin Atkinson signals a foul. Chelsea will take a free kick. Willian (Chelsea) will take the free kick.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Willian (Chelsea) scores a marvellous goal! He smashed a direct free kick from 25 metres into the middle of the net. The normally comfortable situation became a problem for the goalkeeper as the ball slipped behind his back.
Newcastle Utd concede a free kick after one of their players holds onto an opposition player. A free kick has been awarded to Chelsea.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: The referee stops play so that a substitution can be made and Aleksandar Mitrovic departs the field of play to be replaced by Ivan Toney (Newcastle Utd).
Pedro (Chelsea) controls a cross inside the six yard box, but unbelievably sends his shot over the bar. The ball is off of the pitch and it's a goal kick for Newcastle Utd.
Chelsea are passing the ball across the pitch and keep possession. However, an opponent intercepts a pass and the situation changes.
Eden Hazard (Chelsea) goes on a weaving run through the defence and gets within shooting range but his effort is blocked.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Ramires (Chelsea) latches on to a pass and controls it with a good first touch. He unleashes a deadly strike from around 24 metres out which goes into the top left corner.

annotations.label: attendance
annotations.description: The attendance for today's match is 48682.
Falcao (Chelsea) finds himself in a promising position after receiving a clever chip pass, but one of the defending players comes up with a timely interception.
Falcao (Chelsea) times his run too early and the linesman raises his flag for offside.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Cesc Fabregas (Chelsea) takes the corner, but the goalkeeper jumps and gathers the ball.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Substitution. Oscar makes way for Ramires (Chelsea).

Cesar Azpilicueta (Chelsea) finds himself in a promising position after receiving a beautiful cross from the side, but the opposition defence is ready and one of the defenders averts the threat with a quick interception. Chelsea have a corner.
Eden Hazard picks out Oscar (Chelsea), who drives a shot just wide of the right post from the edge of the box. The ball is off of the pitch and it's a goal kick for Newcastle Utd.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Pedro (Chelsea) takes the corner but only sends it into a huddle of the defenders and one of them makes a good clearance.

Pedro (Chelsea) crosses the ball into the box, but one of the defending players averts the threat. The referee and his assistant both point at the corner flag. Chelsea will have an opportunity to threaten the opposition's goal.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: This yellow card was deserved. The tackle by Branislav Ivanovic (Chelsea) was quite harsh and Martin Atkinson didn't hesitate to show him a yellow card.

Willian (Chelsea) displays his superb passing ability after picking out Pedro with a fine lofted pass to continue their attacking move. Pedro (Chelsea) sends over a cross from the side into the penalty area in order to find one of his teammates, but he fails and the opportunity goes begging.
Rough tackle by Moussa Sissoko (Newcastle Utd). The referee blows his whistle for a foul. Chelsea get a free kick. Chelsea try to maintain the tempo of the game by taking a quick free kick.
Martin Atkinson blows his whistle and it's Aleksandar Mitrovic (Newcastle Utd) who is penalised for an offensive foul. Good decision by the referee.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Jose Mourinho has decided to make a change. Willian (Chelsea) replaces Nemanja Matic.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: The game has come to an end for Loic Remy. He has contributed as much as he could today. He will be replaced by the fresh legs of Falcao (Chelsea).

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Goal! The corner is whipped in and Georginio Wijnaldum (Newcastle Utd) is in the right place at the right time, planting his header perfectly into the left side of the goal. He makes it 1:0.

Neat passing move from Chelsea in order to create new attacking opportunities.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: The game restarts for the second half.

There was certainly plenty of action during that opening 45 minutes. The home fans will be really pleased with what they've seen from their players so far. Both teams are attempting to play possession football.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: The match has reached half time.

annotations.label: time
annotations.description: We will have 2 min. of added time.
Chelsea are showcasing great team work by exchanging some short passes and one two passes, waiting to open the opposition's defence and hit them swiftly on the break.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Vurnon Anita sends an inch perfect lofted cross into the box. Ayoze Perez (Newcastle Utd) latches on to it and finishes with a quick shot which hits the left post and bounces in off it. The goalkeeper had no chance. The score changes to 1:0.
Aleksandar Mitrovic (Newcastle Utd) collects a pass inside the box and unleashes a shot which is brilliantly blocked by a defender.
The linesman raises his flag. Pedro (Chelsea) is adjudged offside.

Cesc Fabregas (Chelsea) takes the ball on and fires in a shot from 25 metres out. Tim Krul stops the effort which is headed for the top right corner. The ball is out of play and Chelsea manage to earn a corner.

Daryl Janmaat (Newcastle Utd) tries his luck from the edge of the box after a brilliant solo effort, but it is well blocked by the defender.
Moussa Sissoko (Newcastle Utd) sends a pass into the box, but his attempt is thwarted and cleared.
Pedro (Chelsea) put a cross into the box which wasn't a bad decision, but he failed to achieve what he wanted as none of his teammates managed to meet it.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Cesc Fabregas (Chelsea) steps up to take the corner. He launches the ball into the penalty area, but it only finds the head of an opposing player who clears the danger.
Loic Remy (Chelsea) fails to send a pass into the box as his effort is cut out. The referee blows his whistle, Chelsea are awarded a corner kick.
Moussa Sissoko (Newcastle Utd) tries to create a chance, but puts too much weight on his pass. The ball is off of the pitch and it's a goal kick for Chelsea.

Asmir Begovic was forced into action to thwart Daryl Janmaat (Newcastle Utd). He found himself some space after latching on to a pass and unleashed a shot to the bottom right corner but couldn't beat the keeper.

Ayoze Perez (Newcastle Utd) connected with a pass around the edge of the box, aimed and shot. His attempt went towards the middle of the target, but Asmir Begovic was alert and the score remains the same.

What a poor attempt! Ayoze Perez (Newcastle Utd) drives another shot towards goal this time from further out, but it couldn't have been worse if he had shot blindfolded. The ball goes yards wide of the left post. The ball is off of the pitch and it's a goal kick for Chelsea.
Pedro (Chelsea) races towards goal but the defender gets back well to make a challenge.
Kevin Mbabu (Newcastle Utd) sends a lofted cross into the penalty area. Unfortunately for him, the opponent's defence deals with his cross comfortably and intercepts it.
Branislav Ivanovic (Chelsea) fizzes over a cross which doesn't cause any problems. The ball goes out of play and Newcastle Utd will have a goal kick.
Martin Atkinson couldn't ignore the rough tackle by Kevin Mbabu (Newcastle Utd) and blew his whistle.
Another attempt to send the ball beyond the defence by Oscar (Chelsea) is thwarted and cleared to safety.
Newcastle Utd are playing excellent possession football at the moment by exchanging some long passes.

The Chelsea players are exchanging some short passes to try and open up the opposition’s defence and hit them swiftly on the break.
Martin Atkinson blows the whistle, Branislav Ivanovic (Chelsea) is penalised for a foul.
Moussa Sissoko (Newcastle Utd) collects a pass and has an effort from 24 metres out, but it flies just wide of the left post. The ball goes out of play and Chelsea will have a goal kick.

Georginio Wijnaldum sends a lovely lofted pass forward that flies over the top of the defence and into the path of Aleksandar Mitrovic (Newcastle Utd), but he can't direct his header on target as it flies well wide of the right post. The ball goes out of play and Chelsea will have a goal kick.
Cesc Fabregas (Chelsea) plays a through ball but overhits it. The referee and the linesman both signal a throw in for Newcastle Utd.

Georginio Wijnaldum (Newcastle Utd) and Ayoze Perez attempt to exchange short two yard passes, but the opposition's defence intercepts the ball.
The foul by Oscar (Chelsea) was seen by Martin Atkinson who didn't hesitate to blow the whistle.
Vurnon Anita (Newcastle Utd) sends a long ball across the pitch, but it misses its target. The ball is off of the pitch and it's a goal kick for Chelsea.
Some great controlled play and passing in the middle of the pitch from Newcastle Utd.

Vurnon Anita (Newcastle Utd) slides a pass forward, but one of the defenders cuts it out.
Eden Hazard (Chelsea) sends a promising through ball, but the defence is alert and cuts out the pass.
Close! Kurt Zouma (Chelsea) takes the resultant free kick from 25 metres out and his shot goes just wide of the left post. The ball goes out of play and Newcastle Utd will have a goal kick.
